author.bio: Libertarianish Civic Nationalist that holds free speech and personal accountability as high priorities. I plan to make a Ruqqus fork with political and non-political topics once creation is easier.

post.title: What three items should every woman own?

body: A keychain mace, the knowledge to caretake basic household repairs, and a menstrual cup (hey, you asked).
body_html: A keychain mace, the knowledge to caretake basic household repairs, and a menstrual cup (hey, you asked).

post.title: What three items should every woman own?

body: A gun, a good pair of scissors, a pair of waterproof boots.

post.title: What three items should every woman own?

body:
Correction.  A Gun, a plunger, and a portable battery jumper.

All 3 things are on my list of, "*Things you don't need until you need them right goddamn now.*"
body_html:
Correction. A Gun, a plunger, and a portable battery jumper.

All 3 things are on my list of, "Things you don't need until you need them right goddamn now."
